issue.title: [Java] Fix MapVector#getMinorType and extend AbstractContainerVector addOrGet complex vector API
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6175](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6175). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
i. Currently `MapVector#getMinorType` extends `ListVector` which returns the wrong `MinorType`.

ii. `AbstractContainerVector` now only has `addOrGetList`, `addOrGetUnion`, `addOrGetStruct` which not support all complex type like `MapVector` and `FixedSizeListVector`.
